summary: A unit test module that verifies the functionality of an object detection label source backed by a GeoJSON store, checking correct handling of valid file URIs and proper error raising for invalid write destinations.
business_intent: To guarantee the robustness of the object detection labeling workflow by ensuring that label data can be reliably read from and written to GeoJSON locations, and that misconfigured URIs are detected early, thereby preventing data integrity issues in computerâ€‘vision pipelines.
